## これは




```julia
using DifferentialEquations
using Plots;gr()
```




    Plots.GRBackend()




```julia
function SIR!(du,u,p,t)
    S,I,R=u
    b,g=p
     du[1]=-b*S*I
     du[2]=b*S*I-g*I
     du[3]=g*I
end
```




    SIR! (generic function with 1 method)




```julia
u0=[1000,1,0]
```




    3-element Array{Int64,1}:
     1000
        1
        0




```julia
p=[0.008,5.5]
```




    2-element Array{Float64,1}:
     0.008
     5.5




```julia
tspan=(0.0,200.0)
```




    (0.0, 200.0)




```julia
prob=ODEProblem(SIR!,u0,tspan,p)
sol = solve(prob)
```
